appliesToEverything.description: Text displayed for styles that apply to all sites

defaultTheme.description: Default CodeMirror CSS theme option on the edit style page

styleRegexpTestTitle.message: 符合的已開啟分頁清單（在 URL 上點選以將焦點轉移至它的分頁）

sortStylesHelpTitle.description: Label for the sort info popup on the Manage styles page

manageOnlyUsercss.description: Checkbox to show only Usercss styles

sortStylesHelp.message:
從下拉選單中選取要套用於已安裝項目的排序類型。預設使用標題遞增排序（A 到 Z）。「標題遞減」則會套用遞減排序（Z 到 A）。
還有其他的排序方式。您可以想像對一個多欄的表格進行排序，並且每次選取（加號之間）都代表了一欄或一組。
舉例來說，若設定為「啟用（第一）+標題」，將會把所有已啟用的項目都排列在頂部，然後再以標題遞增（A 到 Z）的順序來分別套用到已啟用與已停用的項目。
sortStylesHelp.description: Text in the minihelp displayed when clicking (i) icon to the right of the sort input field on the Manage styles page

sortLabelTitleAsc.description: Text added to option group to indicate a block of options that apply a title ascending (A to Z) sort

optionsUpdateInterval.message: 使用者樣式自動更新間隔（以小時計，指定為 0 以停用）

sortDateOldestFirst.description: Text added to indicate that sorting a date would add the oldest entries at the top

styleEnabledToggleHint.message: 按下 Alt + Enter 以切換啟用／停用狀態並儲存樣式

也可以使用 PgUp (PageUp) 與 PgDn (PageDown) 鍵。

paginationCurrent.description: Tooltip for the current page index in search results

menuShowBadge.description: Label (must be very short) for the checkbox in the toolbar button context menu controlling toolbar badge text.

popupHotkeysInfo.message:
<1>-<9>、<0>，數字鍵盤也可以 — 切換第 N 個樣式（0 是切換到第 10 個）
<A>-<Z> 切換以該字母為名稱第一個字的樣式
<Shift> 開啟編輯器而非切換
<Numpad +> 啟用列出的樣式
<Numpad –> 停用列出的樣式
<Numpad *> 與 <`> （倒引號）— 切換初始啟用的樣式；不要在彈出式視窗開啟時套用到後來啟用的樣式，這樣您就可以在測試完後復原初始選擇：僅停用全部，然後切換。<Numpad –> <Numpad *>
更多資訊請見 wiki
popupHotkeysInfo.description:
NOTE1: preserve < and > symbols so that <hotkey> is styled as a key.
NOTE2: the last line is displayed as a text of the link to the wiki page.
NOTE3: this is the list of hotkeys displayed after clicking the right edge of the extension popup.

unreachableAMOHint.message: 要允許存取，開啟 <about:config>，在清單上點選右鍵，點選「新增」，然後再點選「布林」，貼上 <privacy.resistFingerprinting.block_mozAddonManager> 並點選確定→<true>→確定，然後重新整理 <addons.mozilla.org> 頁面。

styleRegexpPartialExplanation.message: 這個樣式使用部份符合的正規表達式，違反了 CSS4 @document 規範，其需要完整的 URL 符合。授影響的 CSS 不會討用在頁面上。這個樣式由 Chrome 板 Stylish 所建立，其在早期版本不正確地檢查 'regexp()' 規則（已知的臭蟲）。

linterCSSLintSettings.message: （設定規則為：0 = 停用；1 = 警告；2 = 錯誤）

linkGetHelp.description: Homepage link text on the manage page e.g. https://add0n.com/stylus.html#features with chat/FAQ/intro/info

searchStylesHelp.message:
</> 鍵聚焦於搜尋欄。
純文字搜尋名字、程式碼、首頁 URL 與其套用到的頁面。少於三個字母的單字會被忽略。
符合的 URL：以 <url:> 為前綴來搜尋，例如：<url:https://github.com/openstyles/stylus>
正規表達式：包含斜線與旗標，例如 </body.*?\ba\b/simguy>
精確的單字：以雙引號包住要搜尋的文字，例如 <".header ~ div">
searchStylesHelp.description: Text in the minihelp displayed when clicking (i) icon to the right of the search input field on the Manage styles page

stylusUnavailableForURLdetails.message: 作為安全措施，瀏覽器禁止擴充套件影響其內建頁面（如 chrome://version、截至 Chrome 61 為止的新分頁、about:addons 以及其他頁面）以及其他擴充套件的頁面。每個瀏覽器也都限制對它們自己的擴充套件庫的存取（如 Chrome 線上應用程式商店或是 Firefox 附加元件庫等）。

searchResultUpdated.description: Text for label that shows the search result's last update date

editGotoLine.description: Go to line or line:column on Ctrl-G in style code editor

manageOnlyLocalTooltip.message: （不是透過 userstyles.org 網頁安裝的樣式）
manageOnlyLocalTooltip.description: Tooltip for the checkbox to show only locally created styles i.e. non-updatable

checkAllUpdates.description: Label for the button to check all styles for updates

colorpickerTooltip.description: Tooltip for the colored squares shown before CSS colors in the style editor.

optionsCustomizeBadge.message: 在工具列圖示上的徽章

sortDateNewestFirst.description: Text added to indicate that sorting a date would add the newest entries at the top

paginationPrevious.description: Tooltip for the '<-' button in search results

installUpdateFrom.description: Label to describe where the style gets update

importReportLegendIdentical.description: Text after the number of styles skipped due to being identical to the already installed ones in the report shown after importing styles

manageNewStyleAsUsercss.description: VERY SHORT label for the checkbox next to the 'Write new style' button in the style manager

optionsPopupWidth.message: 彈出視窗寬度（以像素計）

cm_autoCloseBrackets.description: Label for the checkbox in the style editor.

linterInvalidConfigError.message: 因為無效的設定所以未儲存：
linterInvalidConfigError.description: Invalid linter config will show a message followed by a list of invalid entries

styleMissingMeta.description: Error displayed when a mandatory metadata is missing

searchCaseSensitive.description: Tooltip for the 'Aa' icon that enables case-sensitive search in the editor shown on Ctrl-F

appliesLineWidgetWarning.message: 無法與最小化的 CSS 一起運作
appliesLineWidgetWarning.description: A warning that applies-to information won't show properly with minified CSS

configureStyleOnHomepage.description: Label for the button to configure userstyles.org userstyle

usercssReplaceTemplateConfirmation.message: 為新的 Usercss 樣式取代預設的範本為目前的程式碼？

cm_keyMap.description: Label for the drop-down list controlling the keymap for the style editor.

externalSupport.description: Label for the external link to style's support site

manageNewUI.description: Label for the checkbox that toggles the new UI on manage page

unreachableAMOHintOldFF.message: 僅 Firefox 59 或更新版本才能讓您設定允許 WebExtensions 在如同這個一樣的有 CSP 保護的頁面上新增樣式元素。
unreachableAMOHintOldFF.description: Note in the popup when opened on addons.mozilla.org in Firefox < 59

importReportUndoneTitle.description: Title of the message box shown after undoing the import of styles

genericDisabledLabel.description: Used in various lists/options to indicate that something is disabled

cm_indentWithTabs.description: Label for the checkbox controlling tabs with smart indentation option for the style editor.

replaceWith.description: Label before the replace-with input field in the editor shown on Ctrl-H etc.

deleteStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to delete a style

updateCheckManualUpdateForce.message: 安裝更新（本機編輯將會被覆寫）
updateCheckManualUpdateForce.description: Additional text displayed when an update check skipped updating the style to avoid losing local modifications

optionsAdvancedExposeIframes.message: 透過 HTML[stylus-iframe] 公開 iframes

usercssEditorNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the empty name input field when creating a new Usercss style

addStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to go to the add style page

manageOnlyEnabled.description: Checkbox to show only enabled styles

editStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to go to the edit style page

installButtonInstalled.description: Text displayed when the style is successfully installed

cm_theme.description: Label for the style editor's CSS theme.

findStylesInlineTooltip.message: 在此視窗中顯示搜尋結果。
findStylesInlineTooltip.description: Text for a checkbox that displays search results within the Stylus popup.

popupOpenEditInWindow.description: Label for the checkbox controlling 'edit' action behavior in the popup.

appliesRemoveError.message: 無法移除最後的「套用到」項目
appliesRemoveError.description: Error displayed when the last 'applies' is going to be removed

backupMessage.message: 選取檔案並拖曳到此頁面。

importReportUndone.description: Text after the number of styles reverted in the message box shown after undoing the import of styles

helpKeyMapCommand.description: Placeholder text of inputbox in keymap help popup on the edit style page. Must be very short

linterResetMessage.message: 要復原意外的重設，在文字方塊按下 Ctrl-Z（或 Cmd-Z）
linterResetMessage.description: Reset button tooltip to inform user on how to undo an accidental reset

description.message: 用Stylus（一個用戶樣式管理器）重塑網頁。 Stylus 讓你能為诸多主流網站輕鬆的安裝主題和皮膚。

usercssReplaceTemplateName.message: 清空 @name 取代目前範本
usercssReplaceTemplateName.description: The text shown after @name when creating a new Usercss style
